    • getResourceOrThrow

      public <E, ID, R extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<E, ID>, X extends com.dp.spring.springcore.exceptions.ResourceNotFoundException> E getResourceOrThrow(ID id, R repository, X resourceNotFoundException)
      Compact method for getting a resource by only its id, otherwise returning a ResourceNotFoundException.
      Type Parameters:
      E - the type of the resource entity
      ID - the type of the resource id
      R - the type of the repository
      X - the type of the exception to throw
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the resource to get
      repository - the repository to check the resource from
      resourceNotFoundException - the exception to throw in case resource is not found
      Returns:
      the resource

    • getCompanyOrThrow

      public Company getCompanyOrThrow(Integer companyId)

      Parameters:
      companyId - the id of the company to get
      Returns:
      the company

      Returns:

    • getHeadquartersOrThrow

      public Headquarters getHeadquartersOrThrow(Integer headquartersId, Integer companyId)
      Common method for getting a Headquarters resource by its id and the id of the related company, otherwise returning a ResourceNotFoundException.
      Parameters:
      headquartersId - the id of the headquarters to get
      companyId - the company id of the headquarters to get
      Returns:
      the company

    • checkResourceExistenceByIdOrThrow

      public <ID, R extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<?, ID>, X extends com.dp.spring.springcore.exceptions.ResourceNotFoundException> void checkResourceExistenceByIdOrThrow(ID id, R repository, X resourceNotFoundException)
      Compact method for checking the existence of a resource by only its id, otherwise returning a ResourceNotFoundException.
      Type Parameters:
      ID - the type of the resource id
      R - the type of the repository
      X - the type of the exception to throw
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the resource to check
      repository - the repository to check the resource from
      resourceNotFoundException - the exception to throw in case resource is not found
